title: DocumentSet
description: A set of documents that respond to a query.

metadata.description: Summary information about the search, including pagination.

start.description: Offset (zero-based) of first result in this documentset from start of original search results.

end.description: Offset (zero-based) of last result in this documentset from start of original search results.

total.description: Total number of documents that respond to this query.
